branchCategory.name: KX
branchCategory.description: <p>Rotary one-touch fitting series KX comes with double ball race bearing for high speed applications. KX series comes in 5 tube sizes ranging from 4 to 12mm. One-touch collet includes anti tube rotation mechanism. KX is suitable for pressure or vacuum applications.</p>

branchItem.name: KX, High Speed, Rotary, One-touch Fitting
branchItem.description: <p>Rotary one-touch fitting series KX comes with double ball race bearing for high speed applications. KX series comes in 5 tube sizes ranging from 4 to 12mm. One-touch collet includes anti tube rotation mechanism. KX is suitable for pressure or vacuum applications.</p>
